annual.title: Annual certificate
annual.settings_description: IMPORTANT!: To generate your annual certificate you must complete your information below.

nature.1: Entity benefiting from the incentives regulated in title III of Law 49/2002, of December 23, on the tax regime of non-profit entities and tax incentives for patronage.
nature.2: Legally recognized foundation that reports to the corresponding protectorate body or declared association of public utility, not included in the previous apparatus.
nature.3: Holder or administrator of a protected heritage.
